summary: SummarySend blemishes packing and bring your best skin forward with the BLK/OPL Even True Blemish Control Bar. This non-drying Blemish Control Bar cleanses impurities and helps clear the way for your healthiest melanin yet.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsFormulated with Salicylic Acid, this gentle bar soap helps clear up breakouts, control the production of excess oil, and encourage smoother, more even skin over time.FeaturesA nourishing infusion of Shea Butter, Peppermint and Eucalyptus Oils refreshes and hydrates as it lathers.Item 2608010How To UseThis soap lathers into a creamy, silky, milky foam that builds and feels smooth and luscious as you rub into the skin. Rinse.IngredientsSodium Palmate, Sodium Cocoate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Organic Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus (Eucalyptus Globulus) Oil, Pentasodium Pentetate
